title: America USA Flag Watch Face
summary: America USA Flag Watch Face! Take your favourite flag always with you.
description: Flag of United States of America is the best Watch Face ever! Just download this watch face and you will always have your favourite flag showing the time on your hand! The flag design is made in material design style so you will be fashionable and modern! I love you America!Features:•  beautiful and modern design.•  working perfectly on both round and square watches. •  you can see your favourite flag perfectly designed in ambient and ambient low bit modes.•  compatible with most popular smartwatches: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, LG Watch Urbane and many others.
descriptionHTML:
Flag of United States of America is the best Watch Face ever! Just download this watch face and you will always have your favourite flag showing the time on your hand! The flag design is made in material design style so you will be fashionable and modern! I love you America!

Features:
•  beautiful and modern design.
•  working perfectly on both round and square watches.
•  you can see your favourite flag perfectly designed in ambient and ambient low bit modes.
•  compatible with most popular smartwatches: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, LG Watch Urbane and many others.
comments: THX Added move to sd card THX
